code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import{persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import auth from'./auth';import film from'./film';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage,whitelist:['auth','film']};var rootReducer=combineReducers({auth:auth,film:film});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
